00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_TYPE_TRAITS_CONTAINER_HAS_PUSH_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_TYPE_TRAITS_CONTAINER_HAS_PUSH_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/type_traits/add_const.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/type_traits/container/value.hpp>
00017 
00018 namespace boost{
00019 namespace assign{
00020 namespace v2{
00021 namespace container_type_traits{
00022 
00023 
00024     template<typename V,typename T 
00025         = typename container_type_traits::value<V>::type>
00026     struct has_push{
00027         
00028         typedef typename boost::type_traits::yes_type yes_;
00029         typedef typename boost::type_traits::no_type no_;
00030             
00031         template<typename U,void (U::*fp)(T const&)>
00032         struct helper{
00033             // See http://lists.boost.org/Archives/boost/2002/03/27233.php
00034         };
00035         
00036         template<typename U>
00037         static yes_ test(U*, helper<U, &U::push>* p = 0);
00038         static no_ test(...);
00039             
00040         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00041             bool, 
00042             value = sizeof( test((V*)0) ) == sizeof( yes_ )
00043         );
00044 
00045                 typedef boost::mpl::bool_<value> type;
00046 
00047     };
00048 
00049     template<typename V>
00050     struct has_push_deduced_value : v2::container_type_traits::has_push<V>{};
00051     
00052 }// container_type_traits
00053 }// v2
00054 }// assign
00055 }// boost 
00056 
00057 #endif
